rcompendium 0.1
  • Reference

Refresh a research compendium/package

refresh.Rd

This function refreshes a research compendium/package. It will:

  • Update Rd files and NAMESPACE, using devtools::document();

  • Update external packages (DESCRIPTION);

  • Update badges in README.Rmd (if already present);

  • Re-knitr the README.Rmd, using rmarkdown::render();

  • Check package integrity with devtools::check().

refresh(quiet = FALSE, check = TRUE, import = NULL)

Arguments

quiet

a logical value. If TRUE (default) no message are printed.
check

a logical value. If TRUE (default) package integrity is checked using devtools::check().
import

(optional) the name of the folder to recursively detect dependencies to be added in the Imports field of DESCRIPTION file. Default is import = NULL (but R/, NAMESPACE, and @examples are still inspected).

See also

Other setup functions: new_compendium(), new_package(), set_credentials()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
rcompendium::refresh()
}
